35.1. [Odo of Cluny] Epitome Moralium S. Gregorii in Iob.
Epitome | Moralia
Manuscripts:
1. Leningrad Q.1.51. saec. x.
2. Oxford, Bodleian, Laud. Misc. 256. saec. ix2/4; c. France
3. Sankt Gall, Stiftsbibliothek 205, p. 1-470. saec. ix1/2; S. France. (S)
4. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica  Reg. lat. 306. saec. xi1/2; Cluny.
Bibliography:
G. Braga, “Problemi di autenticità per Oddone di Cluny: l’epitome dei Moralia di Gregoria Magno,” Studi medievali, ser. III, 18 (1977), 611-711.
